SEVENUS

Introduction

Yoo Hee Jae is a South Korean singer and actor. He is the maknae of the boy group SEVENUS (formerly MASC).

Although the group initially disbanded, It was announced that he, along with Ireah would be joining PCS Entertainment as SEVENUS in May of 2023.
